thread.title: Here's What You're Wearing to the Opening Night of the New Power Rangers Movie
thread.title_full: Here's What You're Wearing to the Opening Night of the New Power Rangers Movie

author: James Whitbrook
title: Here's What You're Wearing to the Opening Night of the New Power Rangers Movie
text:
Image Credit: John Phillips / Stringer 
I mean, when else are you going to wear what looks like a pair of felt shorts, a matching pair of fabric gauntlets, and a giant shirt with the Blue Ranger’s helmet printed on it? Advertisement 
Fashion designer Bobby Abley recently showed off a Power Rangers -inspired Autumn/Winter 2017 collection at London Fashion Week Men’s, and it is every bit the bizarro mashup of contemporary fashion and teenagers with attitude that you could possible imagine. Only some of it is explicitly Power Rangers in its design, like the helmet-shirts, but some take more subtle elements like dinosaur prints or the diamond pattern of the classic suits and then gives them a suitably weird fashion twist. Check out a few more images below:
